alert.note: Alert for Gage; Johnson; Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 2:28PM CDT until June 01 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Johnson County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Otoe County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sterling, or 11 miles west of Tecumseh, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sterling around 240 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Douglas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding on areas that already received heavy rainfall overnight. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
